name: Touhou Endless Dream
description: MyACG Studio is a leading game research and development team based in China that was established in 2016. At present, their main works include 《The Disappearing of Gensokyo》, and 《Touhou Big Big Battle》 which have received positive praise on Steam. The team members are dream chasers who really love games and have skills with dreams to make great titles. Our goal is to make games that players really love and dream to play.
